price: 44. Mise waxaad mooddaa inay badankoo- du wax maqli ama wax fahmi? Ma aha waxaan xoolo oo kale ahayn 19, iyagaabase ka sii lunsan jid ahaan.
arabic: أَمۡ تَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡقِلُونَۚ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا كَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
footnotes: 19. Geela, lo’da ama adhiga ee wax iska raaca weydiin la’aan meeshii loo kaxeeyaba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am taḥsabu anna aktharahum yasmaʿūna aw yaʿqilūna in hum illā kal-anʿāmi bal hum aḍallu sabīlan
